headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://js.stripe.com https://*.stripe.com https://www.paypal.com https://www.paypalobjects.com https://*.klarnacdn.com https://*.afterpay.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://*.stripe.com https://www.paypalobjects.com; font-src 'self' data:; frame-src 'self' https://js.stripe.com https://hooks.stripe.com https://*.paypal.com https://*.klarna.com https://*.afterpay.com https://pay.google.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.stripe.com https://*.stripe.com https://www.google.com https://apple-pay-gateway.apple.com https://*.paypal.com https://*.klarna.com https://*.afterpay.com;
